page.title: 08THE PARK, WESTWOODSIDE
page.content: In Westwoodside there is a{park.}It was founded in 1970.It was opened by a local builder who donated the land. The{park}is situated south west of Akeferry Road and takes up one and a quarter acres. Before it was a{park it was farmland, growing sugarbeet, cereals and other arable crops. In the{park}there is a swing, slide, rocking horse, climbing frame and goal posts. There is a{park}committee who look after the{park,}they check it once a year.Since its opening they have added a sand pit and some goal posts. In future years they might add half of an acre to the park.They have very little trouble at the{park.}We find that the most popualar time during which children use the{park}is Saturday afternoon, and each afternoon during holidays.
